findings.title: Unprotected functions
findings.description: Several public and external functions are marked with ðŸ›‘, which might indicate that they can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Owner-only functions
findings.description: Functions like `updateDividendTracker`, `excludeFromFees`, `setFees`, and others have `onlyOwner` access control, which could lead to privilege escalation if not properly secured.

findings.title: Internal functions
findings.description: Some internal functions like `_transfer`, `_mint`, `_burn`, and `_setBalance` may be vulnerable to reentrancy attacks or other internal function misuse.
